summary: Bailey is my fourth follower. She is a Nord Sorceress. I decided to attempt a magical follower.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[color=#1e84cc][size=5]
Race- Nord
Class- Combat Sorcerer
Levels with player- 4 to 100
Voice- Female condescending(thought it would be different)
Perks/Sells- Light Foot,Destruction Duel Casting,Fire Bolt and Lightning Bolt, Steadfast Ward
Essential and Marriageable
[/size][/color][/center]
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#f6b26b]Bailey is a Combat Sorceress with lightning and fire spells. This is my first attempt to make a mage type follower. She is made from an earlier save when I first got into Skyrim. I gave her a makeover and decided to make her a follower. She uses the UNP Skinny body. She can be found at the abandoned house just down the road from the Western Watchtower outside of Whiterun.

Please post some screens and give any feedback on issues or just comment on her. Thanks to all the comments on my other followers. I really appreciate them. If anyone has ideas on packaging them or whatever please let me know. I do not have a very high skill set on things to that effect.lol


[/color][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#00ffff][size=3]                                                     This mod can also be used in Skyrim Special Edition.[/size][/color][/font]
author: lewbob
